name: Sins of the Necromancer [DEMO]
description:
Sins of the Necromancer is an old-school NES style 2D side scroller in the style of games like Castlevania and Ninja Gaiden.

Hack, slash, and use a variety of sub-weapons to make  your way through all manner of things that go bump in the night. How far will you go to bring back a loved one?

The demo includes:
- 1 full playable level with a boss fight

- Playtime of about 10-15 minutes

- Awesome soundtrack and old-school graphics

 Any and all feedback is welcome! Please feel free to leave a comment :) 

This game supports Keyboard and Mouse + Controller

KEYBOARD AND MOUSE CONTROLS:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Left Click - Melee Attack

Right Click - Sub-weapon Use

F - Dash

Spacebar - Jump

Direction + Jump + while on wall - Walljump

XBOX GAMEPAD CONTROLS:

D-pad/Left Thumb Stick - Left + Right

X Button - Melee Attack

Y Button - Sub-weapon Use

Rb Button - Dash

A Button - Jump

Direction + Jump + while on wall - Walljump
